author: tpearce
title: Celebrity Big Brother’s Coleen Nolan reveals she won’t see her husband until the END of February as he’s in the States- and he congratulated her win by TEXT
text:
TV Magazine HALF THE WORLD AWAY Celebrity Big Brother’s Coleen Nolan reveals she won’t see her husband until the END of February as he’s in the States- and he congratulated her win by TEXT 
The newly crowned winner went on the Channel 5 show to force a trial separation from her other half By TILLY PEARCE
